column4: The install is pretty small to begin with though. you will definatly be looking for stuff to add to it
The image fits on 1 700 Mb cd
The one thing that gives me fits right now is that Dosbox has all their faqs and help files for windoze. I need to find out how to set up dosbox.conf on Ubuntu
I can't say I've ever heard of windoze, is that an open source clone of Windows?
